item.title: LIGHTPATH TECHNOLOGIES INC 10-K
item.description: LIGHTPATH TECHNOLOGIES INC, which is in the Semiconductors & Related Devices [3674] industry, SEC 10-K filing on September 15, 2022 had 28850 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
